properties.name: owl.file
properties.description: The name of the file for the OWL ontology.

properties.name: algorithm.population-size
properties.description: The population size for the algorithm.

properties.name: algorithm.iterations
properties.description: The maximum number of evaluations that can be run for the algorithm.

properties.description: The distribution index of the crossover.

properties.name: algorithm.selectors.mutation.distribution-index
properties.description: The distribution index of the mutation.
